SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT COUNT(0) AS row_count FROM b_banner_resources WHERE Banner_ID=@@Banner_ID@@,Banner_Name_CH=@@Banner_Name_CH@@,Banner_Name_HK=@@Banner_Name_HK@@,Banner_URL=@@Banner_URL@@,Banner_Type=@@Banner_Type@@,Banner_Location=@@Banner_Location@@,Banner_Status=@@Banner_Status@@,Banner_Seq=@@Banner_Seq@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@; SELECT Banner_ID,Banner_Name_CH,Banner_Name_HK,Banner_URL,Banner_Type,Banner_Location,Banner_Status,Banner_Seq,Create_Time,Create_UserId,Create_User,Update_Time,Update_UserId,Update_User FROM b_banner_resources WHERE Banner_ID=@@Banner_ID@@,Banner_Name_CH=@@Banner_Name_CH@@,Banner_Name_HK=@@Banner_Name_HK@@,Banner_URL=@@Banner_URL@@,Banner_Type=@@Banner_Type@@,Banner_Location=@@Banner_Location@@,Banner_Status=@@Banner_Status@@,Banner_Seq=@@Banner_Seq@@,Create_Time=@@Create_Time@@,Create_UserId=@@Create_UserId@@,Create_User=@@Create_User@@,Update_Time=@@Update_Time@@,Update_UserId=@@Update_UserId@@,Update_User=@@Update_User@@ LIMIT <R%= @@StartIndex@@, @@SelectCount@@ %R> ;
